prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a spiky, green body and a cheerful expression.

Generate a creature that has a round shape and vibrant green accents all over its body.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a small, friendly bush with big eyes and a smile.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines elements of nature and has a strong, sturdy appearance.
Design a playful Pokemon that can blend into forest environments with its leafy features.
Show me a Pokemon that has a unique shape and bright colors, perfect for a nature-themed game.
